Original:
調酒還算好喝，但一整個體驗很糟！
我們在提前近一個月就訂位，我們沒有遲到甚至提前15分鐘抵達

我們到了預約的時間22點整進去後說 要再稍等 因為客人準備要結帳 請我們先到空桌坐著等候

很明顯店內人員座位安排不佳、收服務費卻沒有感受到任何服務！

The bartender is pretty delicious, but the whole experience is bad!

What really makes people feel poorly experienced

22:15 The group of guests can take the seat smoothly when we leave

The store rules in the wine list are only written to the low -consumption part and did not write a service fee 10% of the service fee 10%

Original:
我對於這裡的音樂噪音問題感到非常沮喪和憤怒。這裡的建築物已有30多年歷史,隔音效果極差,你們的酒吧音樂聲音能穿透管線一直傳播到五樓。每到夜晚,音量越來越大,令人難以入睡，連基本的白噪音都蓋不過。
身為一名新住戶,我已經忍受了幾個月這種痛苦的經歷,實在是困擾不已。我期望業主能夠重視並解決這一嚴重的噪音汙染問題,確保我們擁有安寧的居住環境。
這棟大樓的管線就在你們的吧檯後方，我請求你們將音響移至其他位置。如果無法移位，請至少將音量調小，特別是在晚上11點到凌晨4點之後。這樣不僅對我們居民更友善，也會造福整棟建築的和諧環境。希望這問題能夠儘快得到解決，謝謝。
EN:
I feel very frustrated and angry about the music noise here.The building here has a history of more than 30 years, and the sound insulation effect is very poor. Your bar music sound can penetrate the pipelines and spread to the fifth floor.At night, the volume is getting bigger and bigger, which is difficult to fall asleep, and even the basic white noise cannot be built.
As a new resident, I have endured this painful experience for a few months, which is really troublesome.I hope that owners can pay attention to and solve this serious noise pollution problem, and ensure that we have a peaceful living environment.
The pipeline of this building is behind your bar, I asked you to move the sound to other positions.If you cannot move, please at least the volume, especially after 11 pm to 4 am.This will not only be more friendly to our residents, but also benefit the harmonious environment of the entire building.I hope this problem can be solved as soon as possible, thank you.
